title: dashboard serve Configuration File
description: The configuration file for the dashboard application when running as a web service

web.title: Web Servie Configuration
web.description: The configuration for the web service

bind.title: The Web Serve Configuration
bind.description: The configuration for binding the web service on startup

address.title: Service Address
address.description: The hostname or IPv4/IPv6 address to bind the service to on startup

port.title: The ports for services to bind to
port.description: The configuration for the various service ports to bind to

web-port.title: Web Service Port
web-port.description: The TCP port number to bind the web service to on startup

metrics-port.title: Metrics Service Port
metrics-port.description: The TCP port number to bind the metrics service to on startup

proxies.title: Proxy Addresses
proxies.description: A list of IPv4 and/or IPv6 CIDRs which should be trusted for providing the remote Client address

timeouts.title: Web Server Timeouts
timeouts.description: Configure timeouts for the web service

timeout-headers.title: Request Headers Timeout
timeout-headers.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to read the headers for the request from the client

timeout-read.title: Request Read Timeout
timeout-read.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to read the full request, after the headers, from the client

timeout-write.title: Request Write Timeout
timeout-write.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to write the full response, including the body, to the client

timeout-idle.title: Request Idle Timeout
timeout-idle.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to keep a connection open between requests from a client

logging.title: Logging Configuration
logging.description: Configure the logging output from the dashboard send command

logging-level.description: Set whether or not to use JSON-based structured logging

logging-json.description: Set whether or not to use JSON-based structured logging
